description:
本视频是一部关于Adobe Illustrator 软件的设计视频，在视频中除了将操作过程详细讲述外，还对每个实例中设计的技巧做了详细说明，本视频中每个案例都按照设计的基本流程进行，让观看者能够深入浅出的了解设计制作的整个过程。通过本视频的学习，不但可以用Illustrator 制作出相应的作品，还能还能了解作为一个设计师要了解的知识。

Thisvideois a movie aboutAdobeIllustrator softwaredesign of video,in the videoin addition to theoperation processin detail,but also to designeach instanceof thetechniquesin detail,each caseinthevideoarecarried out in accordance with thebasicprocess design,letthe viewer canexplain profound theories in simple languagetodesignthe whole process of the production.Through thisvideolearning,not onlycan producethe correspondingworkswith Illustrator,but alsocan beunderstood as adesignerto understand theknowledge.
title: Adobe Illustrator 软件的设计            设计师要了解的知识
